list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: look at and comprehend the meaning of (written or printed matter) by mentally interpreting the characters or symbols of which it is composed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's the best novel I've ever read
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là cuốn tiểu thuyết tốt nhất tôi từng đọc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: discover (information) by reading it in a written or printed source.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was arrested yesterday—I read it in the paper
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã bị bắt hôm qua, tôi đọc nó trong bài báo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: understand or interpret the nature or significance of.
inspect and record the figure indicated on (a measuring instrument).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I've come to read the gas meter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đến để đọc đồng hồ khí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a computer) copy, transfer, or interpret (data).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it attempts to read a floppy disk without regard to its format
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nó cố gắng đọc một đĩa mềm mà không liên quan đến định dạng của nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hear and understand the words of (someone speaking on a radio transmitter).
having a specified level of knowledge as a result of reading.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Ada was well read in French literature
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ada đã đọc tốt trong văn học Pháp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having a readership of a specified extent.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it is still a widely read newspaper
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nó vẫn là một tờ báo được đọc rộng rãi
